snippet: Stan Wawrinka spent the first set of his U.S. Open semifinal letting Kei Nishikori push him around the court....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka spent the first set of his U.S. Open semifinal letting Kei Nishikori push him around the court.

headline.print_headline: Stan Wawrinka Outlasts Nishikori to Reach 1st US Open Final
headline.main: Stan Wawrinka Outlasts Nishikori to Reach 1st US Open Final
